name: REX
description: "MarketBloc is the first multichannel AI ad platform with your own AI CMO, Rex, automating ads across social, Google, and display--without the $10k agency fee, and using ad fraud tech that boosts your spend by up to 9x. Welcome to the future of digital advertising!"
one_liner: "MarketBloc is the first multichannel AI ad platform with your own AI CMO, Rex, automating ads across social, Google, and display--without the $10k agency fee, and using ad fraud tech that boosts your spend by up to 9x. Welcome to the future of digital advertising!"
